apps.name: Cowabunga
apps.subtitle: A jailed MDC Toolbox app
apps.localizedDescription: A Jailed toolbox application for iOS 14.0-15.7.1 & 16.0-16.1.2 using CVE-2022-46689.
apps.versionDescription: Added creating operations. Fixed crash when a custom operation corrupts - hopefully will figure out cause for corruption. Fixed bootloop with regard to resetting icon cache. Please update, this is an important fix. Not only does it stop a bootloop, but it should hopefully increase reliability of applying.

apps.name: FilzaEscaped
apps.subtitle: The iOS File Manager with Root Access
apps.localizedDescription: The iOS File Manager with Root Access.

apps.name: SantanderEscaped
apps.subtitle: A File Manager for iOS with full file access.
apps.localizedDescription: A new, enhanced File Manager for iOS devices with the tccd exploit for full file access. Santander aims to enhance the experience of a file manager on an iOS device, using modern and familiar UI alongside new APIs.
apps.versionDescription: The project is still in beta, and there still quite a lot of bugs to fix & enhancements to make.

apps.name: WDBRemoveThreeAppLimit
apps.subtitle: Remove the 3 app limit.
apps.localizedDescription: Removes the 3 app limit imposed on free apple IDs. Only needs to be applied once per boot.

apps.name: DynamicCow
apps.subtitle: Enable Dynamic Island on iOS 16.0-6.1.2.
apps.localizedDescription: Enable Dynamic Island on every device that is running iOS 16.0 to 16.1.2 using the MacDirtyCow exploit. /nThe app now have a Troubleshoot section to restore the plist file. /niOS 15/14/13 are NOT and will never be supported, as this is NOT a tweak. /nIf you have one of the above listed iOS versions, please stay away from it cause it can bootloop your device.
apps.versionDescription: DynamicCow 1.1 is out with following changes:/n· Red bar is now finally fixed on iPhone XR/11./n· New settings view with a troubleshoot section is now available. Now you can reset your corrupted plist file and app state./n· 15x Faster then before.
